contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=August 2010}} {{Infobox software | name = CuteFTP | caption = CuteFTP 8.2 | developer = GlobalSCAPE | latest_release_version = 8.3.4 (Windows) {{Start date and age|2010|06|02}} / 3.1.2 (Mac) {{Start date and age|2011|11|23}} <!-- When updating this, also update [[Comparison of FTP clients]] --> | operating_system = [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] & [[Mac OS X]] | genre = [[FTP]] client: Home & Pro | license = Proprietary | website = http://www.cuteftp.com/ }} '''CuteFTP''' is a series of [[file transfer protocol|FTP]] (file transfer) client applications developed by [[GlobalSCAPE]] since 1996, with both a [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]]-based or [[Macintosh|Mac]]-based [[graphical user interface|interface]] and made for both home and professional use. CuteFTP is used to transfer files between computers and File Transfer Protocol (FTP) servers to publish web pages, download digital images, music, multi-media files and software, and transfer files of any size or type between home and office. Since 1999, CuteFTP Pro and CuteFTP Mac Pro have also been available alongside CuteFTP Home with free trial periods. It was originally developed by the Canadian Alex Kunadze. == See also == *[[Comparison of FTP client software]] ==References== *{{cite web|url=http://www.macworldcanada.ca/a/helpandtips/weekly-download-cuteftp/78d668ccc0a80006001bd8715db0196a/pg001.htm|publisher=MacWorld Canada|title=CuteFTP review|archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20090217071155/http://www.macworldcanada.ca/a/helpandtips/weekly-download-cuteftp/78d668ccc0a80006001bd8715db0196a/pg001.htm|archivedate=2009-02-17|first=Siobhan|last=Cole|date=10/11/2008}} == External links == *[http://www.cuteftp.com/cuteftp/ CuteFTP Official Website] {{DEFAULTSORT:Cuteftp}} [[Category:FTP clients]] [[Category:1996 software]] {{network-software-stub}}
